{attribute 'strict'}

Note: Accoring to ISA-TR88.00.02-2022 This is a DINT
{attribute 'strict'}:

www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: Automation Box CtrlX S3 Author: Romain Ferrari Date: 2024 August 16
Summary: Enum of possible states that can be disabled using their values in CurDisabledStates. This enum use data type and value according Document: ISA-TR88.00.02-2022 / 7.5.3.22 Admin.CurDisabledStates
Note: Accoring to ISA-TR88.00.02-2022 This is a DWORD
{attribute 'strict'}

Documentation.xhtml: Rename depending the usage More possible states can be added

documentation.xhtml:
www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: Automation Box CtrlX S3 Author: Romain Ferrari Date: 2024 August 16
Summary: Enum OF possible Commands for the Command_CntrlCmd to take. This enum use data type and value according, but new ID's can be added. Document: ISA-TR88.00.02-2022 / 7.5.3.9.2 StopReason.ID
Note: Accoring to ISA-TR88.00.02-2022 This is a DINT
{attribute 'strict'}

www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: HEVS Pack 2022 Author: Cedric Lenoir Date: 2024 August 29
This struct is mainly used to build U_ModeBitDword
For remote, to be completed
Trigger detect a new command That is, new state is different that last one.
For debut, allows to show activation of trigger

www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: HEVS Pack 2022 Author: Cedric Lenoir Date: 2024 August 27
Summary: This FB converts Pack BOOL commnds to Command_CntrlCmd : DINT; Command_CmdChangeRequest : BOOL; Cmd on rising edge only
Commands are evaluated with this priority Abort - Stop - Complete - Hold - Suspend - Reset - Clear - Start - Unhold - Unsuspend That means mainly that Abort, then Stop should not be masked by other commands.
By setting this flag to FALSE, SC State Complete is disabled
By setting this flag to FALSE, Unit Mode Change Complete is disabled
Default settings for Disabled States, set in ACT_SetDefaultSettings
Definition of available modes, to be defined in ACT_DefaultSettings. Check below to define Disable State and Transitions for each mode
Invalid := 0, Production := 1, Maintenance := 2, Manual := 3, Test := 4
Default settings for State Trsnsitions, set in ACT_SetDefaultSettings Invalid := 0, Production := 1, Maintenance := 2, Manual := 3, Test := 4
Check change
For remote, to be completed
Trigger detect a new Change Mode That is, new mode is difference than the old one. Delay bCmdUnitModeChangeRequest of one cycle, beause new mode MUST be present before change request
For debut, allows to show activation of trigger
Reset command if no change after 3000 ms

www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: HEVS Pack 2022 Author: Cedric Lenoir Date: 2024 August 29
Summary: This FB converts Pack BOOL commnds to Cmd_UnitMode : DINT; Cmd_UnitModeChangeRequest : BOOL; Cmd on rising edge only
Modes are evaluated with this priority Production - Maintenance - Manual - Test - User_05 - User_06 - User_07 - User_08
has to take the PackTag Status.StateCurrent
Store last cycle at the en of FB call to detect and state change Used to force minimum of one testSC.In = 0 and reset SC once between each SC

www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: HEVS Pack 2022 Author: Cedric Lenoir Date: 2024 August 06
Summary: Used to test and simulate first version of PackMaster Does nothing in Waitstates Wait 2.5 secoond before to return SC in
Current Acting state of each module is finished.
In 32 bits, list of disabled states, by default: 0
TRUE if SC State Complete not present for more than timeTimeOut Could be used for a Warning.
For UI diagnostic and info
Used to clean Admin_CurDisabledStates if needed. That is, remove acting states if the linked wait state is not present. Use a Union Variant of DWORD
This timer is used to send some info if SC not present for long time. Time in ms, default 5000 means 5 [s]
Next state if statedisabled is FALSE
Disabled condition, e.g. (localDisabledStates.boolState.Stopping = 1)
Next state if statedisabled is TRUE

www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: HEVS Pack 2022 Author: Cedric Lenoir Date: 2024 August 27
Summary: This FB return the BOOL State format of: PackTag.Status.StateCurrent
Unit Mode Change Complete, must be TRUE when all Module have finiched Change. If no delay requested, could be set to TRUE by default
Read once at first cycle, cannot be changed later.
Command selected Mode, must be present when Cmd_UnitModeChangeRequest is activated.
Command is set upon rising edge of the boolean.
The actual state is needed to determine if transition is possible in Admin_ModeTransitionCfg
To know if a mode is available.
To know available possible transitions
FB Active
Invalid := 0, Production := 1, Maintenance := 2, Manual := 3, Test := 4
Invalid if not Cmd_UnitModeChangeRequest
UnitModeCurrent in STRING format Actually set in the code of This FB.
Change mode Help, some info
Use to maintain change mode until end of change.
For diagnostic
Compute a DWord with exactly one bit
Current mode enable transition from state
Target mode enable transition to state

www.hevs.ch Institut Systemes Industriels Project: HEVS Pack 2022 Author: Cedric Lenoir Date: 2024 August 28
Summary: Mode manager Default at start is Production mode := 1
Used in different HEVS_PackML FBs and STRUCTs and in lower branches of the HEVS_PackTag_V30
Used in one of the main PackTag branch of the HEVS_PackTag_V30 : Command
Used in one of the main PackTag branch of the HEVS_PackTag_V30 : Status
Used in one of the main PackTag branch of the HEVS_PackTag_V30 : Admin
is absolutely limited by C_ADMIN_MAXMODESTRANSITIONPACK
as Pack used DWORD and 0 is reserved, max is limited to 31
Used in lower branches of the HEVS_PackTag_V30
Used in different HEVS_PackML FBs and STRUCTs and in lower branches of the HEVS_PackTag_V30
Used in one of the main PackTag branch of the HEVS_PackTag_V30 : Command
Used in one of the main PackTag branch of the HEVS_PackTag_V30 : Status
Used in one of the main PackTag branch of the HEVS_PackTag_V30 : Admin
is absolutely limited by C_ADMIN_MAXMODESTRANSITIONPACK
as Pack used DWORD and 0 is reserved, max is limited to 31
Used in lower branches of the HEVS_PackTag_V30
